summary: Ego vehicle is driving down a street with moderate traffic. A bus is in front of the ego vehicle. There are cars parked on the right side of the road and buildings on both sides.
actions: Ego vehicle is driving straight. The bus in front is also driving straight. Other vehicles are moving in the same direction.
characters: Pedestrians are visible on the sidewalks.
key_objects: Ego vehicle, bus, cars, pedestrians, buildings, traffic lights.
key_actions: The bus obscures the view of the right side of the road, potentially concealing pedestrians or cyclists.
next_action: Ego vehicle will continue driving straight.

summary: Ego vehicle approaches an intersection. There are pedestrians and cyclists crossing the street. The bus is still in front of the ego vehicle, partially obscuring the view.
actions: Ego vehicle is approaching an intersection. Pedestrians and cyclists are crossing the street.
key_objects: Ego vehicle, bus, pedestrians, cyclists, intersection, traffic lights.
key_actions: potential ghost probing: A cyclist appears from behind the bus while crossing the street. The bus is partially obscuring the view of the cyclist.
next_action: Ego vehicle will likely slow down or stop at the intersection.
